title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set returns incorrect results or a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0' in the data set and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: Instead, as the developer mentioned, when using 'row[0]' as a filter expression, it should not be considered as the filter criteria. An error message related to the incorrect filter expression should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'. 
2. Click on the Preview tab.
